name: Cube Bash
description:
This game is in development and things are subject to change. This is the second ever game I've made so please submit ideas and bugs in the discussion board below.

Battle your friends in an epic couch party game! Local co-op game where you fight to be the last cube alive on a shrinking platform.

-Controls-

Escape to exit

Use PC compatible console controllers.

Left Joystick to move.

Xbox-

A to dash

PlayStation-

X to dash (not sure)

-Gameplay-

Clock - Slows down time to 0.5

Cube - Builds a random wall to block off your opponents or you!

Hammer - Stuns your opponents for 2 seconds, just enough time to dash, pushing your opponents off the edge!

-Update Log-
